languages.text: При взгляде на это устройство вы чувствуете легкий укол в сознании. Вам открывается незримое — едва заметная трещина в кажущемся целом корпусе.

traits.locale_text: При взгляде на это устройство вы чувствуете легкий укол в сознании.Вам открывается незримое — едва заметная трещина в кажущемся целом корпусе.

languages.text: As you look at the device, you feel a slight prickle inside your mind. You are now aware of something beneath perception: a nigh-invisible crack in the seemingly solid frame of the device.
languages.original_text: При взгляде на это устройство вы чувствуете легкий укол в сознании. Вам открывается незримое — едва заметная трещина в кажущемся целом корпусе.

traits.locale_text: As you look at the device, you feel a slight prickle inside your mind. You are now aware of the imperceptible — a nigh-invisible crack in the seemingly solid frame of the device.
As you look at the device, you feel a slight prickle inside your mind. You are now aware of the imperceptible — a nigh-invisible crack in the seemingly solid frame of the device.
As you look at the device, you feel a slight prickle inside your mind. You are now aware of the imperceptible: a nigh-invisible crack in the seemingly solid frame of the device.
As you look at the device, you feel a slight prickle inside your mind. You are now aware of the imperceptible: a nigh-invisible crack in the seemingly solid frame of the device.
As you look at the device, you feel a slight prickle inside your mind. You are now aware of something beneath perception: a nigh-invisible crack in the seemingly solid frame of the device.
As you look at the device, you feel a slight prickle inside your mind. You are now aware of something beneath perception: a nigh-invisible crack in the seemingly solid frame of the device.

languages.text: 装置を見ていると、頭の中にチクチクとした痛みを感じる。一見頑丈そうに見えるフレームに、ほとんど目に見えない裂け目が入っているのだ。
languages.original_text: As you look at the device, you feel a slight prickle inside your mind. You are now aware of something beneath perception: a nigh-invisible crack in the seemingly solid frame of the device.

traits.locale_text: 装置を見ていると、頭の中にチクチクとした痛みを感じる。一見頑丈そうに見えるフレームに、ほとんど目に見えない裂け目が入っているのだ。

languages.text: 当你看着这台设备时，你感觉心中传来了难以言喻的刺痒感。如今，你已经看到了原本看不到的东西：尽管这台设备看起来坚不可摧，但它的框架上却有着几乎无法察觉的裂痕。
languages.original_text: As you look at the device, you feel a slight prickle inside your mind. You are now aware of something beneath perception: a nigh-invisible crack in the seemingly solid frame of the device.

traits.locale_text: 当你看着这台设备时，你感觉心中传来了难以言喻的刺痒感。如今，你已经看到了原本看不到的东西：尽管这台设备看起来坚不可摧，但它的框架上却有着几乎无法察觉的裂痕。

languages.text: Mientras observas el aparato, sientes una ligera punzada en el interior de la cabeza. Ahora eres consciente de algo casi perceptible: una grieta apenas visible en el aparentemente sólido armazón del aparato.
languages.original_text: As you look at the device, you feel a slight prickle inside your mind. You are now aware of something beneath perception: a nigh-invisible crack in the seemingly solid frame of the device.

traits.locale_text: Mientras observas el aparato, sientes una ligera punzada en el interior de la cabeza. Ahora eres consciente de lo imperceptible: una grieta apenas visible en el aparentemente sólido armazón del aparato.

languages.text: Als du das Gerät ansiehst, spürst du ein leichtes Kribbeln in deinem Verstand. Du spürst etwas jenseits deiner Wahrnehmungsfähigkeit: einen nahezu unsichtbaren Riss im ansonsten massiven Gehäuses des Geräts.
languages.original_text: As you look at the device, you feel a slight prickle inside your mind. You are now aware of something beneath perception: a nigh-invisible crack in the seemingly solid frame of the device.

traits.locale_text: Als du das Gerät ansiehst, spürst du ein leichtes Kribbeln in deinem Verstand. Du hast nun das Nicht-Wahrnehmbare wahrgenommen: einen nahezu unsichtbaren Riss im ansonsten massiven Gehäuses des Geräts.

languages.text: Au moment où vous posez les yeux sur l'appareil, vous ressentez comme un picotement dans votre esprit. Vous discernez alors dans la structure une fissure quasi invisible qui vous était jusque-là imperceptible.
languages.original_text: As you look at the device, you feel a slight prickle inside your mind. You are now aware of something beneath perception: a nigh-invisible crack in the seemingly solid frame of the device.

traits.locale_text: Au moment où vous posez les yeux sur l'appareil, vous ressentez comme un picotement dans votre esprit. Vous discernez alors dans la structure une fissure quasi invisible qui vous était jusque-là imperceptible.

languages.text: Cihaza baktığında zihninde hafif bir batma hissi oluşuyor. Algı sınırlarının ötesindeki bir şeyin farkına varıyorsun: Cihazın sağlam gözüken kasasında neredeyse görünmez bir yarık var.
languages.original_text: As you look at the device, you feel a slight prickle inside your mind. You are now aware of something beneath perception: a nigh-invisible crack in the seemingly solid frame of the device.

traits.locale_text: Cihaza baktığında zihninde hafif bir batma hissi oluşuyor. Algı sınırlarının ötesindeki bir şeyin farkına varıyorsun: Cihazın sağlam gözüken kasasında neredeyse görünmez bir yarık var.
